properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: Please contact station personnel or conductor for assistance. For inbound commuter rail riders, please disembark at Back Bay and return to Ruggles via the Orange Line. \nFor outbound customers, please take the Orange Line to Back Bay and board the commuter rail at Back Bay. Please contact station personnel for assistance.
